summary: The Berg family wins a journey to Africa. When the kids want to participate in charitable work with endangered animals, and their parents can't, they persuade their Uncle Eric to go instead.
cast: Peter Mygind|Mathilde Høgh Kølben|Sebastian Kronby|Lasse Guldberg Kamper|Frida Luna Roswall Mattson|Rumle Riisom|Mille Dinesen|Vicky Brooker|Ditte Hansen|Robert Hansen|Vibeke Hastrup|Thomas Levin|Troels Malling Thaarup|Josef W. Nielsen|Momelezi V. Ntshiba|Clara Rugaard
title: Min søsters børn i Afrika
